replies.body: There is an Avicus Clan called AvicusNetwork, but it doesn't have that many people. I'm a level 71 farming in silver 2(Tip: If you are a high level and can stay in gold 2 easily, farming in silver 2 is amazing and almost all of my battles are 3 stars and 100 thousand+ loot).

replies.body: The Raven. I am currently part of [The M.O.D.] which is a clan with me and a few friends.If you're level 50+ you are more than welcome to join! We are mostly lev 50 and above and the level 40 and below are second accounts or war starters.
